newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: ARA fuel oil bunkers yo-yo, rest of Europe mixed.
newsitem.headline: ARA fuel oil bunkers yo-yo, rest of Europe mixed.

text.p: ARA fuel oil bunkers swung back from initial peaks on Tuesday, while prices in the rest of Europe were mixed, dealers said.
Rotterdam 380 CST was quoted at $99/100 fob at the end of the day after the barge market drew back from an early trade of $101 fob ARA and gained a little from the lowest deal.
Some traders said refinery supply was becoming tight. Others said such comments were designed to cloud a market which was not reacting to fundamentals.
After a reasonable rush of business on Monday, enquiries dried up.
Enquiries built up slightly from mid-afternoon, but total traded volume only reached around 5,000 tonnes.
Hamburg prices were lower at around $101/$104 fob. Business, as in Rotterdam, was slack.
Mediterranean prices were mixed, with gains in France and price falls in Italy. Prices held steady in Spain.
Trading was thin in all ports.
